articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: The Lumon Terminal Pro computer pops up on Apple’s website - TechCrunch
articles.description: The Lumon Terminal Pro -- the computer used in Apple TV's hit series "Severance" -- has appeared on Apple's retail website. When shopping Apple.com,
articles.content: The Lumon Terminal Pro — the computer used in Apple TV’s hit series “Severance” — has appeared on Apple’s retail website. When shopping Apple.com, you’ll see the new device, adorned with a red “New” … [+1324 chars]
